app.containers.App.app.title: Sadata
app.containers.App.app.claim: Samoa's home of human rights implementation
app.containers.HomePage.intro: Welcome to Sadata, the one stop show for everything you need to know about human rights implementation in Samoa. Explore inside where you will find the Government's Implementation Plan covering all human rights and the SDGs and containing detailed actions and reports of progress to date.
nmrf.components.Footer.disclaimer: Every care has been taken to ensure the accuracy of this data and information. Please send any feedback to
nmrf.components.Footer.responsible.text: Visit Samoa's NMRF (National Mechanism for Reporting and Follow-up) online to learn more about human rights in Samoa
nmrf.components.Footer.partners.title1: UNDP Cook Islands, Samoa and Tokelau
nmrf.components.Footer.partners.title2: The Office of the United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights
nmrf.components.Footer.partners.title3: New Zealand High Commission, Apia, Samoa
